code: import React,{useState}from"react";import ColorSelector from"./ColorSelector";import StarRating from"./StarRating";import"./ProductCard.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const COLOR_MAP={yellow:"Yellow Gold",white:"White Gold",rose:"Rose Gold"};const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const[selectedColor,setSelectedColor]=useState("yellow");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",style:{border:"1px solid #eee",borderRadius:"16px",padding:"28px",width:"270px",background:"#fafafa",textAlign:"center"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.images[selectedColor],alt:product.name,style:{width:"100%",borderRadius:"12px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:"16px",fontWeight:500,fontFamily:'Montserrat-Medium',fontSize:15},children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{margin:"12px 0 12px 0",fontSize:15,fontWeight:400,color:"#222",letterSpacing:"0.5px",fontFamily:'Montserrat-Regular'},children:product.calculatedPrice?`$${product.calculatedPrice.toLocaleString('en-US',{minimumFractionDigits:2,maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD`:"Calculating..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ColorSelector,{colors:Object.keys(product.images),selectedColor:selectedColor,onSelect:setSelectedColor}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontSize:12,color:"#888",fontFamily:'Avenir-Book'},children:COLOR_MAP[selectedColor]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StarRating,{score:(product.popularityScore*5).toFixed(1),fontFamily:"Avenir-Book",fontSize:14}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Weight: ",product.weight,"g"]})]});};export default ProductCard;
